EmailTemplate.name: 17.CloudBnd.CloudBand.none.D.G.E.18293.Openstack APJ thank you.Email Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: OpenStack Sydney - Let’s Continue the Conversation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> It was great meeting you down under! G’day Mates!
We had a blast meeting you in Sydney and showing you our latest advances in cloud operations. Now that we’re all back to our daily lives, we wanted to share a few more ideas about how you can use OpenStack services to automate fault management on the CloudBand cloud infrastructure. Check out the OpenStack wikis to learn more:
- Vitrage, the OpenStack Root Cause Analysis Service <[[https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/Vitrage]]> - Mistral, the OpenStack Workflow Service <[[https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/Mistral]]>
Join the conversation:
- Attend Vitrage design meetings Wednesdays at 08:00 UTC at #openstack-meeting-4 - Go to the IRC channel for daily discussions at #openstack-vitrage
See our sessions from Sydney
- What makes Mistral an OpenStack super-star? Right, CloudFlow! <[[https://www.openstack.org/videos/sydney-2017/what-makes-mistral-an-openstack-super-star-right-cloudflow]]> - Mistral project update <[[https://www.openstack.org/videos/sydney-2017/mistral-project-update]]> - All you need to know about CPU pinning and how to make it work <[[https://www.openstack.org/videos/sydney-2017/all-you-need-to-know-about-cpu-pinning-and-how-to-make-it-work]]> - Advanced Fault Management with Vitrage and Mistral <[[https://www.openstack.org/videos/sydney-2017/advanced-fault-management-with-vitrage-and-mistral]]> - Vitrage Project Updates <[[https://www.openstack.org/videos/sydney-2017/vitrage-project-updates]]>
We’re committed to building better projects together and look forward to collaborating with you.
To receive CloudBand related marketing information in the future, please subscribe for Application & Analytics related topics here <[[https://pages.nokia.com/1701SubscriptionCtr.html]]>.
Get in touch with us today!
Your Nokia CloudBand team Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
